genre.name: Dystopian
genre.description: A novel presenting a terrifying vision of a controlled and totalitarian future society.

book_event.name: Dystopian Future Symposium
book_event.description: A symposium discussing the impact and relevance of 1984 in today's world.

authors.biography: Eric Arthur Blair, known by his pen name George Orwell, was an English novelist, essayist, journalist and critic.

reviews.review_text: A chilling depiction of a dystopian society that feels all too relevant.

genre.name: Fantasy
genre.description: An epic high-fantasy novel that is the first of three volumes in The Lord of the Rings trilogy.

book_event.name: Middle-earth Festival
book_event.description: A festival celebrating the works of J.R.R. Tolkien and the world of Middle-earth.

book_series.name: The Lord of the Rings
book_series.description: An epic high-fantasy series written by J.R.R. Tolkien.

authors.biography: John Ronald Reuel Tolkien was an English writer, poet, philologist, and academic, best known as the author of the high-fantasy works The Hobbit and The Lord of the Rings.

awards.name: International Fantasy Award
awards.organization_name: Science Fiction and Fantasy Writers of America

reviews.review_text: A brilliant start to an epic saga filled with rich lore and memorable characters.

genre.name: Novella
genre.description: A short novel that explores themes of alienation, identity, and existential anxiety.

book_event.name: Kafkaesque Literature Symposium
book_event.description: A symposium dedicated to the works of Franz Kafka and his influence on modern literature.

authors.biography: Franz Kafka was a German-speaking Bohemian novelist and short-story writer, widely regarded as one of the major figures of 20th-century literature.

reviews.review_text: A haunting and thought-provoking story that delves deep into the human condition.
